mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM MEMBER A, FARMER B WHERE A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID) R
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM (SELECT * FROM AUCTION A, STOCK B WHERE A.STOCK_NO = B.STOCK_NO) R
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM FUND

SELECT R.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.MEM_ID, A.MEM_NAME, A.MEM_GRADE, B.FARMER_STATUS FROM MEMBER A, FARMER B WHERE A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND A.MEM_DROP = 'N') R WHERE R.RNUM BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
SELECT * FROM MEMBER A, FARMER B WHERE A.MEM_ID = B.MEM_ID AND A.MEM_ID=#{id}
UPDATE FARMER SET FARMER_STATUS=2 WHERE MEM_ID=#{id}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_GRADE=2 WHERE MEM_ID=#{id}

SELECT R.RNUM, R.MEM_ID, R.STOCK_NAME, R.AUC_STARTPRICE, R.AUC_REGDATE, R.AUC_ENDDATE, R.AUC_STATUS, R.AUC_NO FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, A.*, B.* FROM AUCTION A, STOCK B WHERE A.STOCK_NO = B.STOCK_NO ORDER BY A.AUC_REGDATE DESC) R WHERE R.RNUM BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
UPDATE AUCTION SET AUC_STATUS=2 WHERE AUC_NO=#{no}
